summary: Katniss kills the boy from District 1 who just attacked Rue with am arrow before he can even pull out his spear. Katniss is promises Rue that she will win the Games, caring and singing for her until she dies. She takes the supplies of Rue and the Boy from district 1. She proceeds by decorating Rues body with flowers before leaving her to be collected by the hovercraft. She gets giftet a loaf of bread, that seems like it was originally meant for Rue but now that she had died it was given to Katniss instead. She goes into a tree and sleeps for the night. When she wakes up, she sorts through her supplies and then goes hunting for food and to find her way back to the Stream. After shooting a few birds, she lights Rues unlit fire and starts waiting for the smoke to attract the Careers. When it doesn't she wants to go to sleep, when it's announced that there has been a rule change: Two people can win these Hunger Games, as long as they are from the same District and both alive at the end.
